comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Sybil Appleton (1899-1973) worked with the American Committee for Devastated France (ACDF) in 1921: www.afs.org/archon/index.php?p=collections/controlcard&am... She married Oliver Wolcott (1891-1967) in 1922, and they had three children (Helen, Augusta, and Oliver). Here's Sybil and Oliver's tombstone, elsewhere on Flickr: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/spotboslow/4410330496/]
